con:config.script:
import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils
String charset = (('A'..'Z') + ('0'..'9')).join() Integer length = 8 String randomString = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray()) log.info(randomString) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue( "viewID", randomString)

con:restRequest.name: create_view
rename_view
